content.title: Informative/Explanatory | Compare-and-Contrast Essay
content.instructions: Drag the proofreading marks to identify the errors. Type misspelled or missing words.
content.text:
Spending and Saving

Every year my family gives me money for my {l}Birthday. I always want to buy something with it. My {l}Parents always want me to save it. I think that when you get a gift you should have fun with it. I like to take my money to {-|two} a store and buy toys{.} After I buy some toys, I take them home and play with them. That makes me happy. My parents say I will have a lot of money if {+|I} save. Then I can use it for something big and important. Maybe {u}i will buy only one toy this year and put the rest of the money in my bank.
